title: Ticket #1894: Contrib for condor_triggerd daemon
description:
The proposed contrib module would be for a Condor daemon that utilizes QMF for raising configured events. QMF (Qpid Management Framework) is based upon the AMQP messaging implementation in Apache Qpid (https://cwiki.apache.org/qpid/qpid-management-framework.html).

Currently, this code base has external dependencies on: 

    * Apache Qpid 0.8 (pre-release)
    * Boost C++ libraries (1.39 or higher)
